resources.string: This is for Flaming up the Name

FlamesGame is a Relationship Calculating Algorithm famous between the youngsters and even adults. At the time of Graduation or at High Schooleveryone might heard about this and many of them tried out this secretly. People have been known to take this seriousy! So what does FLAMES stand for?
So, Do you have the guts to find out what is the real thing between you two?
